## Publish
- [ ] Respond to brief inquiry (email, schedule call)
- [ ] Set up doc ([template](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1hrht4eCUS9zMbcfwPVlb6NlRfxgf7O9DE10DXhlF8SQ/edit?usp=sharing))
- [ ] Write brief
- [ ] Get public feedback
- [ ] Publish
- [ ] Promote
